pullrequest.title: Change minibatch to use numpy.random.choice to avoid need to seed two different RNGs

content.raw: I don't think we should use multiple independent random number generators if we can avoid it. A better approach is to change minibatch so that it uses `numpy.random` instead of standard library `random`.
content.html: I don't think we should use multiple independent random number generators if we can avoid it. A better approach is to change minibatch so that it uses numpy.random instead of standard library random.
